definition: (used of things) lacking sense or awareness, a person who lacks knowledge of evil
details:
adjective
- (used of things) lacking sense or awareness
= example: (used of things) lacking sense or awareness
- completely wanting or lacking
= synonyms: free
- lacking intent or capacity to injure
= example: lacking intent or capacity to injure
= synonyms: innocuous
- free from evil or guilt
= example: free from evil or guilt
= synonyms: guiltless, clean-handed
- lacking in sophistication or worldliness
= example: lacking in sophistication or worldliness
= synonyms: ingenuous
- free from sin
= synonyms: impeccant, sinless
- not knowledgeable about something specified
= synonyms: unacquainted
noun
- a person who lacks knowledge of evil
= synonyms: inexperienced person
